mapper.sql: SELECT C.ID AS CONFIRMATION_ID, C.CREATED_AT AS CONFIRMATION_CREATED_AT, C.ATTEMPTS AS CONFIRMATION_ATTEMPTS, C.MODIFIED_AT AS CONFIRMATION_MODIFIED_AT, C.LINK AS CONFIRMATION_LINK, U.ID AS USER_ID, U.ID AS USER_ID, U.LAST_NAME AS USER_LAST_NAME, U.DOB AS USER_DOB, U.USERNAME AS USER_USERNAME, U.PASSWORD AS USER_PASSWORD, U.ENABLED AS USER_ENABLED, U.VERIFIED AS USER_VERIFIED, U.CREATED_AT AS USER_CREATED_AT, U.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL, U.FIRST_NAME AS USER_FIRST_NAME, U.MODIFIED_AT AS USER_MODIFIED_AT, S.ID AS STATUS_ID, S.STATUS AS STATUS_TYPE, S.MODIFIED_AT AS STATUS_MODIFIED_AT, S.CREATED_AT AS STATUS_CREATED_AT, SE.ID AS SETTING_ID, SE.CREATED_AT AS SETTING_CREATED_AT, SE.MODIFIED_AT AS SETTING_MODIFIED_AT, SE.NEWS_ENABLED AS SETTING_NEWS_ENABLED, SE.SOUND_ENABLED AS SETTING_SOUND_ENABLED, A.ID AS AUTHORITY_ID, A.AUTHORITY AS AUTHORITY_TYPE, A.MODIFIED_AT AS AUTHORITY_MODIFIED_AT, A.CREATED_AT AS AUTHORITY_CREATED_AT FROM argon.CONFIRMATIONS C LEFT JOIN argon.USERS U ON C.USER_ID = U.ID LEFT JOIN argon.STATUSES S ON S.ID = U.STATUS_ID LEFT JOIN argon.SETTINGS SE ON U.ID = SE.USER_ID LEFT JOIN argon.USER_AUTHORITIES UA ON U.ID = UA.USER_ID LEFT JOIN argon.AUTHORITIES A ON UA.AUTHORITY_ID = A.ID
